domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @GOPLeader Aren't you focusing on the wrong thing? COVID-19 is spreading rampantly throughout the country, infecting millions and killing over 120,000. Our hospitals are reaching max capacity.  40million out of work, Food chain interrupted, And you are concerned about statues of the past.
